update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXTRACTS
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PACKAGE_NAME = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EXTRACT_THE_WAY = #{extractTheWay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TENDER_AT = #{tenderAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXTRACTS set PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID = #{procurementDepId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRACTION_TIME = #{extractionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXTRACTION_SITES = #{extractionSites,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRACT_THE_WAY = #{extractTheWay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXTRACTS_PEOPLE = #{extractsPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT D.NAME PURCHASE_TYPE,D1.NAME PROJECT_TYPE from T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RECORD E LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_DICTIONARY_DATA D ON E.PURCHASE_TYPE = D.ID LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_DICTIONARY_DATA D1 ON E.PROJECT_TYPE = D1.CODE WHERE E.EXTRACT_THE_WAY = '1' AND E.IS_DELETE = '0' AND E.PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID = #{value} ORDER BY E.CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RECORD
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID = #{procurementDepId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_TYPE = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_NAME = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_NUMBER = #{packageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSTRUCTION_PRO = #{constructionPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSTRUCTION_ADDR = #{constructionAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_BEGIN = #{sellBegin,jdbcType=DATE},
SELL_END = #{sellEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
SELL_ADDRESS = #{sellAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_PROVINCE = #{sellProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_SITE = #{sellSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NUM = #{contactNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
EXTRACT_THE_WAY = #{extractTheWay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHERE ID = #{id}
